alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Palm Beach County through 315 PM EDT... At 224 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, or 16 miles south of Belle Glade, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, South Bay, Lake Harbor, Okeelanta, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Belle Glade Camp and Loxahatchee NWR. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
